name: core-rtc
author: elmarti
description: The perfect guts for any WebRTC application

scripts.test: nyc mocha -R mocha-lcov-reporter > coverage/coverage_temp.lcov -r ts-node/register test.ts
scripts.E2E: rm -rf E2E/testproject/src/scripts/dist && cp -a dist E2E/testproject/src/scripts && cd E2E/testproject && npm install && npm run build && cd ../.. && ./node_modules/cucumber/bin/cucumber.js E2E/features
scripts.E2E-clean: cp -a dist E2E/testproject/src/scripts && cd E2E/testproject && npm install && npm run build && cd ../.. && ./node_modules/cucumber/bin/cucumber.js E2E/features/RTCFly_V1.feature
